kodkod.engine

Class Statistics

  • java.lang.Object
    • kodkod.engine.Statistics

  • public final class Statistics
extends Object
    Stores the statistics gathered while solving a given formula.
    Specfields:
    formula: Formula // the formula being solved
    bounds: Bounds // the bounds on the formula
